## Load Slice Data

```{r}
x = Import("tst") %>% Data.Sort()

        LTD <- LTDexp(x$Data)
        PP <- PPexp(x$Data)
        IO <- IOexp(x$Data)

        Bl0 <- Bl_Analysis(LTD$Baseline)
        De0 <- De_Analysis(LTD$Decay, dfC = Bl0$dfCross)
```
